channel.title: Hugo on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Useful Hugo Shortcodes
item.description: If you are using Hugo as a static site generator tool then you might have used hugo built-in shortcodes but here are some amazing hugo shortcodes which can be used in markdown files of your hugo website. Shortcodes are simple snippets inside your content files calling built-in or custom templates. Create Custom Shortcode To create a shortcode, place an HTML template in the layouts/shortcodes directory of your source organization. Consider the file name carefully since the shortcode name will mirror that of the file but without the .

item.title: Add Structure Data in Hugo Website
item.description: When you add structure data to your website, it helps google, bing or other website indexers to understand the content for your website and pages which leads to better search results for your website and eventually helps in SEO ranking.
